mapper.insert: insert into book(title, author, publisher, pub_date, price, genre, img, summary, hwp) value(#{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{pub_date}, #{price}, #{genre}, #{img}, #{summary}, #{hwp})
mapper.update: update book set title=#{title}, genre=#{genre}, author=#{author}, publisher=#{publisher}, pub_date=#{pub_date}, price=#{price}, img=#{img}, summary=#{summary} where booknum=#{booknum}
mapper.select: select * from book where booknum >0 order by booknum limit #{page}, 10;
